catalog_script_client.name: Mascara de CPF

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_5fd53ef3970dc6905e9fb680f053af3d
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable>IO:7689f5284744021008334d05516d4388</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Mascara de CPF</name><order/><published_ref/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }

    var cpf = g_form.getValue('cpf');
	var cpfReplaced = cpf.replace(/\D/g, '');
	
   if(cpfReplaced.length !== 11){
	alert('CPF DEVE POSSUIR  11 NUMEROS');
	g_form.setValue('cpf', '');
   } else {
	

	var mascara = cpfReplaced.substring(0, 3) + '.' + cpfReplaced.substring(3, 6) + '.' + cpfReplaced.substring(6, 9) + '-' + cpfReplaced.substring(9, 11);
	g_form.setValue('cpf', mascara);

   }
	
	
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-03-27 02:28:13</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>5fd53ef3970dc6905e9fb680f053af3d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Mascara de CPF</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Case Banco Brasil Tecnologia" source="x_1174267_case_b_0">c1eb252c4704021008334d05516d4344</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Case Banco Brasil Tecnologia">c1eb252c4704021008334d05516d4344</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_5fd53ef3970dc6905e9fb680f053af3d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-03-27 02:40:36</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><va_supported>true</va_supported><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
